text: Mbe maaŋ ana nzuaim, ana mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde ra garim, ana ŋkotuguraagen verav hɨvim, nde khaŋ nzuai, ‘Tugar vhuuŋ ntige kɨrga.’ 16.2 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi vhɨrve, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Mba ŋkaa phunini kɨtɨgar ki kameŋ, Matiu nduara ne khergi fhuvara. Guma mbe zumgum mba kameŋ khergi.
